I bought this mobile back in November 2016 after lot of market research. I gave it 3 star due to some drawback.
The positive side of Lg stylus 2:
1. Awesome look. I just fall in love by its look. Its slim & stylish. It would add a classy effect in your hand.
2. Camera quality is brilliant. It would give a good competition to iphone 5s.
3. Easy to use. Not that complicated as Xperia.
4. Battery back is too good. The phone would not switch off even in 4% charge.
5. The speaker sound quality is good.
Headphone is nice as well.
6. 5"7 inch screen would made ur experience of watching videos positive.
Now the negative side.
1. Do not have call recording facility.
2. You cannot screenshot.
3. It some time becomes too heat but cools down fast as well. But it might be a probldm for the heavy users.
4. After using 3 month it sometimes getting hang.
Overall I'm loving this phone but it did not reach up to my expectation. But in this price range it is worth buying.
Regards
Jayesmita
